column1: Antanifotsy [antaniˈfutsʲ] (also Antanifotsy Gara) is a city
column2: rural commune and a district located in Vakinankaratra Region in Madagascar. It is the eighth largest city in the country
column4: 626 in 2004. The city is at 112 km from Antananarivo and at 60 km to Antsirabe on the National Road n7 (RN7). Ilempona Gara (at the entrance of Antanifotsy) is a railway station on the Antananarivo - Antsirabe line.

column1: The District of Antanifotsy is composed by 14 Rural Communes: Ambatolahy · Ambatomiady · Ambatotsipihina · Ambodiriana · Ambohimandroso · Ambohitompoina · Ampitatafika · Andranofito · Anjamanga · Antanifotsy · Antsahalava · Antsampandrano · Belanitra · Soamanandrariny. (Source: SDPPSPF  Antanifotsy - 2020)

column2: the commune of Antanifotsy was composed by 59 Fokontany. 12 of them were moved to Soamanandrariny when it became a new commune: Ambalavao
